name: market_get_full
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool bb_finance.
Tool description: This API helps to query for all information about finance summary, stocks, quotes, movers, etcâ€¦ to create a financial site/application such as bloomberg.com
API description: Retrieves comprehensive information about specified stock tickers using the Bloomberg Finance API.

is_id.description: A comma-separated string of ticker IDs corresponding to the desired stocks. These IDs are returned by the `/market/auto-complete` endpoint.
